*Club domestic league appearances and goals, correct as of 21 September 2021‡ National team caps and goals, correct as of 11 October 2021

Zito André Sebastião Luvumbo (a mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị nke 9 n'ọnwa Maachị n'afọ 2002) bụ onye Angola na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba bọọlụ dị ka winger aka nri na mba Italy maka Como na mgbazinye ego site na Cagliari

A mụrụ ya na Luanda, Luvumbo malitere ọrụ ya na Primeiro de Agosto, ma mee ule na ụlọ akwụkwọ klọb Manchester United nke mba England n'ọnwa Febụwarị 2019. E jikọtara ya na mbugharị na klọb West Ham United nke England.
N'ụbọchị 23 n'ọnwa Septemba 2020, ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ 5 na klọb Serie A nke Italy Cagliari
Na 27 Julaị 2021, ọ kwagara Como na mgbazinye ego ogologo oge.

Luvumbo gbara bọọlụ maka Angola under-17s, ma nata oku mbụ ya na ndị otu okenye n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2019. N'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2019, o mere nke mbụ ya na otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Angola na mmeri 0-1 megide Gambia.
